headline: Why Analysts See Travelers (TRV) Story Shifting As Pricing Risks Meet Underwriting Strengths
summary: The latest update to Travelers Companies' modeled fair value trims the target only slightly, from about US$297.10 to about US$296.95, which mirrors how closely recent analyst views are clustering around the stock. This tiny shift reflects a tug of war between research that highlights strong underwriting execution and earnings power, and more cautious commentary that points to tougher pricing conditions in key property and casualty lines. Stay with this article to see how you can keep on top...
